title: Program
description:
REC’s Academy offers structured language preparation, degree admission support, short-term study experiences,

and customized study-abroad pathways for international students aspiring to study in Korea.

banner.title: Intensive Korean Language Study Program
list: REC’s Academy coordinates Korean language training in collaboration with <bold>university-affiliated language schools</bold> at national and private Korean universities.
Students develop core language skills, including <bold>speaking, listening, reading, and writing</bold> through structured, accredited programs.

list.value: 4 times per year (March, June, September, December)
Conditional admission to selected universities may be possible
Guidance for dormitories or approved external accommodation

items.title: Recommended For
list: Prospective international students preparing for Korean university entry
Learners seeking to improve Korean language proficiency
Students preparing for the <bold>TOPIK</bold> examination

banner.title: Korean University Degree Admission Support
list:
REC’s Academy provides professional consulting and document support for international students applying

to Bachelor’s and Master’s degree programs at Korean universities.
We offer step-by-step guidance to help students meet academic, language, and institutional admission requirements.

items.title: Key Features
list: Guidance for admission to Korean universities (undergraduate & graduate levels)
Support for applicants planning a <bold>major change or long-term career development in Korea</bold>

items.title: Our Support Includes
list: Major counseling and university matching
Analysis of admission requirements (TOPIK, English proficiency, GPA, etc.)
Writing and editing of personal statements and study plans
Coordination of application submission and preparation for the selection process

banner.title: An intensive program that allows you to experience Korea for a short period of time
list:
We offer short-term training programs that allow you to experience the Korean language,

culture, and university life for a short period of 3 to 8 weeks.
banner.buttonText: Apply for short-term study abroad counseling

items.title: Key Features
list: Foreign students who want to experience Korea during their vacation
Prospective international students who want to experience the Korean university environment before enrolling

items.title: Recommended For
list: Program duration: 3-8 weeks
Korean language classes + cultural experiences (hanbok, traditional food, company tours, etc.)
Accommodation provided on or connected to the university campus
Issuance of the certificate of completion and provision of confirmation of participation
